Lobo_da_boss_,"2020-08-15T19:21:36.14Z","Like the build don't like the theme ","

Opening

column2: knights monster is a great army builder for fans of the nexo knights antagonists .

column1: The build starting with the head has two very large horn pieces and basic eye and forehead structure . The body is where it gets more interesting because the jawline of the beast continues down the entirety of the body using the 1×
column2: 2 white modified plate with three teeth , also the arms yet stubby are good as the have some poseability and three nice orange claws on each hand to hold onto enemys . The legs have one joint of articulation and are nicely sloped along the sides . The one Accessory included is a hammer which is nicely textured and study .

column2: t like nexo knights this is a good set that is well built for such an inconsequential set for nexo knights fans I recommend it for Lego fans I recommend it .
